DOC.HEADLINE: ITALY ' S GOVERNMENT PASSES LAST HURDLE
DOC.TEXT: The conservative government of Italian Prime_Minister Silvio Berlusconi easily passed its last hurdle to governing on Friday , winning a vote_of_confidence in the lower house of Parliament . The coalition won by a 366-245 vote_in the Chamber of Deputies , where it enjoys a wide majority . Victory came harder on Wednesday in the Senate , where the coalition has just short of a majority , and won by a 159-153 vote . " Let ' s get_to work , " a smiling Berlusconi said after the evening vote . " We have a Cabinet meeting. "
